title: Home | SIT 10th Anniversary
text_lines: JavaScript is off. Please enable to view full site.
JavaScript is off. Please enable to view full site.

A decade ago, we embarked on a journey fuelled by a clear vision: to be a university of applied learning, dedicated to nurturing future-ready graduates able to contribute meaningfully to Singapore's growth and development.
Today, we stand proud of the vibrant community we've fostered and the remarkable achievements of our students, faculty, and staff.

Over the past decade, SIT has grown in student numbers, industry partners, and applied research projects. We have developed new educational pathways to better address the needs of our learners, and of industry.

Even as we look ahead and set our sights on becoming a premier university of applied learning, we will always keep individuals, industry and innovation at our core. Thank you for your trust and for joining us on this journey!

We've come a long way, and we're excited to share some of the incredible milestones we've achieved together. Step inside our commemorative microsite and discover the stories, the triumphs, and the impact that SIT has made over the past decade.
Plates of Plenty - Engaging the Community Through Food
SIT Community Connects: Building Bonds in Punggol
SIT Spreads Holiday Cheer Through Gift-Giving Initiative
SIT Partners with SHINE to Empower Students Through Night Tutoring Programme
article_texts:
A decade ago, we embarked on a journey fuelled by a clear vision: to be a university of applied learning, dedicated to nurturing future-ready graduates able to contribute meaningfully to Singapore's growth and development.
Today, we stand proud of the vibrant community we've fostered and the remarkable achievements of our students, faculty, and staff.

A Bright
Future Ahead
Over the past decade, SIT has grown in student numbers, industry partners, and applied research projects. We have developed new educational pathways to better address the needs of our learners, and of industry.
Even as we look ahead and set our sights on becoming a premier university of applied learning, we will always keep individuals, industry and innovation at our core. Thank you for your trust and for joining us on this journey!
Professor Chua Kee Chaing
President
Singapore Institute of Technology
